text: The Bowls England National Championships (Walker Cup) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="50"|Year !width="250"|Champion !width="250"|Runner-up |- | align=center|2008||Somerset ||Berkshire |- | align=center|2009||Durham ||Warwickshire |- | align=center|2010||Devon ||Essex |- | align=center|2011||Surrey ||Lincolnshire |- | align=center|2012||Huntingdonshire ||Cumbria |- | align=center|2013|| Durham ||Oxfordshire |- | align=center|2014||Surrey ||Nottinghamshire |- | align=center|2015||Devon ||Lincolnshire |- | align=center|2016||Leicestershire||Devon |- | align=center|2017||Somerset||Kent |- | align=center|2018||Sussex ||Yorkshire |- | align=center|2019||Lincolnshire ||Northamptonshire |- |align=center|2020|| cancelled || due to the COVID-19 pandemic. |} ==References== Category:Bowls in England
title: Bowls England National Championships (Walker Cup)
